mainSlider.heading: SMART JEWELRY THAT CAN SAVE YOUR LIFE

bracelet.heading: KWEMA BRACELET
bracelet.p1: Kwema developed the immediate Response Network for women in compromised situations. The system is activated using Kwema’s smart bracelets that calls for help in only 3 seconds.
bracelet.p2: Once activated, the bracelet syncs with your phone and it will send an alert with your GPS location to friends and family as well as other users nearby.

testimonial.text: The bracelet that would prevent crimes against Mexican women

slider2.heading: THE BRACELET DESIGNED TO KEEP YOU SAFE AND SOUND!

mainFeatures.alert: Stay safe by alerting your safety contacts
mainFeatures.connect: Stay connected through Kwema’s community wherever you go
mainFeatures.location: Share your exact location in real time

kwemaApp.heading: KWEMA APP
kwemaApp.p1: We’re building the biggest network of first responders in the world.
kwemaApp.p2: Join the community and invite your friends! Be there for your beloved ones when they need you the most. In an emergency ask for help to all your friends, family and other users nearby who are part of the Kwema’s community with just one click!

partner.heading: HOW TO BECOME OUR PARTNER?
partner.h2: Interested in becoming a partner of KWEMA?
partner.h3: Awesome! Your business and your community can benefit in many ways!
partner.p1: Are you interested in improving the safety in your community? We are too! Join our network of partners where security companies, governments and organizations that represent women are joining efforts to build safer communities together.
partner.p2: You can reach out to us sending an email to partners@kwema.co or simply by filling out this form and we’ll get in touch with you!
partner.p3: We'd love to hear from you. Let’s talk!

choosePlanTitle: Choose a plan that fits you best:
freeShippingText: Check if you apply for free shipping
shippingNotp1: The notifications of your order will be sent to the contact below
shippingNotp2: Another recipient email adress may be added below
getKwemaApp: GET KWEMA APP TO SETUP YOUR DEVICE

explore.title: GET STARTED WITH YOUR NEW BRACELET
explore.p1: To start using your KWEMA bracelet, download and install the KWEMA app.
explore.p2: To activate your bracelet create an account. Once you create a profile, remember to verify your email address before you continue.
explore.p3h: SYNC YOUR BRACELET WITH YOUR PHONE
explore.p3: Sign in to the KWEMA app. Go to My Devices > Add New and enter your device serial number. Remember to keep Bluetooth and GPS on all the times.
explore.p4: Add your safety contacts, make sure to add at least 3 people. Bonus points if you add more than 5 people. You can choose who receives your notifications.
explore.p5: Test your device by pressing the button for 3 seconds.1 Mississippi, 2 Mississippi, 3 Mississippi.
explore.po1p: Download the free KWEMA App, sync your bracelet with your account and add your safety contacts.
explore.po2p: Press and hold the button in your bracelet for 3 seconds.
explore.po2pg: If you activated an emergency alert by accident, don’t forget to let your loved ones know you’re OK
explore.po3p: The KWEMA app will immediately notify your safety contacts. Depending on the plan you have, it can also notify other users nearby and/or the security company you choose.
explore.personalsecurity: THE PERSONAL SECURITY SYSTEM POWERED BY COMMUNITY
explore.feature1p: Press the hidden button in your bracelet
explore.feature2p: Kwema will sync with your mobile to alert your loved ones and share your exact location
explore.feature3p: The app will also send a proximity-based message to other people around you
explore.feature4p: Kwema's Safety Network is now ready to help you as fast as possible
explore.stats1: of women don’t feel safe walking alone at night (Gallup, 2014)
explore.stats2: of victims of trafficking for sexual exploitation are women and girls
explore.stats3: women suffer physical or sexual violence

explore.comingupf1: Acces to your personal security service.
explore.comingupf2: Security professionals will follow protocol in order to deliverhelp as soon as possible. This service will be available in Mexico City only.

changePlanText: You can improve your plan at any time. If you are in the BFFs or Girl Power plan, you can change to a smaller plan after 6 months. If you were not happy with the service you can cancel at any time without additional cost.

plan1.p3: Notify friends and family using mobile data or via SMS
plan1.p4: Add up to 10 contacts to your Safety Network

plan2.p1: For best friends to share everything
plan2.p3: Notify friends and family using mobile data or via SMS
plan2.p4: Add up to 10 contacts to your Safety Network

plan3.p1: For family above all, always and forever

plan3.p4: Add unlimited contacts to your Safety Network
